Description: Verify user can register successfully after entering correct data on first name, last name, username and password field
Steps:
1. Enter valid data on first name field
2. Enter valid data on last name field
3. Enter valid data on username field
4. Enter valid data on password field
5. Click on Register button
Expected Result: User should see a success message "Registration successful"

Description: Verify user cannot register successfully after entering incorrect data on first name
Steps:
1. Enter invalid data on first name field like special characters
2. Enter valid data on last name field
3. Enter valid data on username field
4. Enter valid data on password field
5. Click on Register button
Expected Result: User should see an error message "Please enter valid First Name"
